author: randomishwalk
content: Anyone familiar with Harmony? Technically a side chain and not L2, yes? https://www.harmony.one/

author: protolambda
content: Afaik, it's a different (more centralized) L1, not a sidechain, not a L2

author: randomishwalk
content:
Thanks! Yeah it didn’t seem like an L2 agree there. 

Sorry can you dumb it down for me — what’s the distinction between an EVM compatible alt-L1 vs a “sidechain”? And for the typical user / front-end dApp developer, is there a noticeable practical difference?
